Eldritch shards with relatively little power still make fabulous weapons.

Of course, they'll cut your hand open if you're not protected. I need some leather to wrap these with. It's got to be tough, as well.

Kill {@LinkCreature:34#100#maligos icestalkers} and collect the hide around their heads. It's tough!
These will do rather well. Thank you.
I can't just wrap the hafts with cloth or lambskin. They'll be sheared away, as will my fingers! Bring me the hide.
